response.overview: Newlyweds Tim and Mary Hatfield leave Cherry Creek, Iowa, for a fresh start in Hollywood. After failing to find an apartment, they move into “Bareview,” a swanky complex with a surprising “clothing optional” clause. As they adjust to the nudist lifestyle, they’re welcomed by colorful neighbors—Eddie and Irene, slick landlord Marty, bombshell Candy, wisecracking Hank, drunken Pete, and buff poolman Dave. Trouble brews when a pair of outraged fundamentalists catch sight of Candy and launch a crusade to shut Bareview down. Now the residents must unite to defend their carefree, clothes-free way of life.
response.title: Our Nudist Neighbors
